curam.util.ctm.bom.impl

Class SecurityIdentifierReadAndUpsertBOMImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModuleImpl
      • curam.util.ctm.bom.impl.SecurityIdentifierReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule, ReadAndUpsertBOM

    public class SecurityIdentifierReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
extends BusinessObjectModuleImpl
implements ReadAndUpsertBOM
    This class is responsible for reading, updating and inserting Security Identifier BOM information. A Security Identifier BOM consists of the SIDs and its associated FIDs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurityIdentifierReadAndUpsertBOMImpl()
      Default constructor that sets the Business Object type to Security Identifier and the offset to 0.

    • Method Summary

      This method constructs all Security Identifier related entities into xml and adds this xml to the boBody.
      org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
      This method takes in a SID name as the key for the Security Identifier BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the SIDs and its associated FIDs for this BOM.
      void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value, java.lang.String entityName)
      Sets the primary key value of the Security Identifier BOM which can consist of SIDs and FIDs.
      void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier, org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)

    • Method Detail

      • convertBusinessObjectContentToXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
                                                       throws AppException,
                                                              InformationalException
        This method takes in a SID name as the key for the Security Identifier BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the SIDs and its associated FIDs for this BOM. All of this information is then stored in XML format as specified by the BOM infrastructure.
        Specified by:
        convertBusinessObjectContentToXML in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains the SID name.
        Returns:
        xml representation of the Security Identifier BOM.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • constructSecurityIdentifierBOContent

        public java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> constructSecurityIdentifierBOContent(org.w3c.dom.Element boBody,
                                                                                BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                                                                                org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                                         throws AppException,
                                                                                InformationalException
        This method constructs all Security Identifier related entities into xml and adds this xml to the boBody.
        Parameters:
        boBody - This is the body of the xml that will contain all entity details for Security SID and Security FID SID records.
        boIdentifier - This contains the Security SID name key information.
        document - This is the document object used in processing.
        Returns:
        The list of dependency header information.
        Throws:
        AppException - General exception.
        InformationalException - General Informational exception.

      • upsert

        public void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                   org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
        Update or insert a Security Identifier BOM. This consists of SIDs and its associated Security FIDs.
        Specified by:
        upsert in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - This contains the SID name for the BOM.
        boDocument - This contains details of the Security Identifier BOM to be inserted or updated.
        Throws:
        AppException - General exception.
        InformationalException - General Informational exception.

      • setPrimaryKey

        public void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key,
                          java.lang.Object value,
                          java.lang.String entityName)
        Sets the primary key value of the Security Identifier BOM which can consist of SIDs and FIDs.
        Parameters:
        key - Contains name of the column of an entity.
        value - Contains value of column of an entity.
        entityName - Contains name of the entity of assessment business object.

      • upsertEntity

        public void upsertEntity(java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.Object entityDtlsObj)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Update or insert an entity based on the entity name. This method will update or insert a Security Identifier or a Security FID SID entity.
        Parameters:
        entityName - Contains name of the entity which should be either Security Identifier or a Security FID SID.
        entityDtlsObj - Contains details of the entity.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
